Name: Ludoria
About the game: Ludoria is an adventure/RPG game that combines exploration, base building, and monster taming in a beautifully set universe. Join the adventure, and explore an immense voxel world inhabited by Ludoroms. Collect resources, craft items, capture monsters, and start your journey.
